hadiths.text: Ja'far b. 'Amr b. Huraith reported his father as saying:As if I am seeing Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) on the pulpit with a black turban on his head, and its two ends hanging between his shoulders. Abu Bakr (another narrator) did not make mention of:" Upon the pulpit

chapter.ara-name: باب جَوَازِ دُخُولِ مَكَّةَ بِغَيْرِ إِحْرَامٍ
chapter.eng-name: It is permissible to enter Makkah without Ihram
